{{cpp/title|make_error_condition{{dsc small|(std::io_errc)}}}}
{{cpp/io/io_errc/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=ios|since=c++11|
std::error_condition make_error_condition( std::io_errc e ) noexcept;
}}

Constructs an {{lc|std::error_condition}} object from a value of type {{lc|std::io_errc}} as if by {{c|return std::error_condition(static_cast&lt;int&gt;(e), std::iostream_category())}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|e|error code number}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A value of type {{lc|std::error_condition}} that holds the error code number from {{c|e}} associated with the error category {{c|"iostream"}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;system_error&gt;

int main()
{
    std::error_condition ec = std::make_error_condition(std::io_errc::stream);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "error condition for io_errc::stream has value " &lt;&lt; ec.value()
              &lt;&lt; "\nand message \"" &lt;&lt; ec.message() &lt;&lt; "\"\n";
}
|output=
error condition for io_errc::stream has value 1
and message "unspecified iostream_category error"
}}
